Stage 3 History - Australians All by Nadia Wheatley. A great range of text to discuss

Q4 Flood and Fire by Jackie French and Bruce Whately.

Q3 the role of teacher and student talk in developing language and learning is critical.
#tesoloz
Q3 teaching and learning cycle is critical - negotiating the field, deconstruction, joint construction and independent construction #tesoloz

use quality literature to highlight vocabulary and language choices made by the author,
and how this makes their writing effective #tesoloz
Q3 "we need to give students opportunities to, play with language and  develop a metalanguage to discuss what works" Gibbons  #tesoloz
A3 through targeted, explicit teaching of academic language #tesoloz
A2 design learning opportunities for students to practice the target language, multiple times #tesoloz
A2 the mode continuum is  the principle of EAL/D planning and programming. Systematic planning of deliberate talk #tesoloz
A2. How to develop academic language with students - Tier 2 vocabulary as well as language about language (metalanguage) #tesoloz

A2. How to move students along from spoken like to written language - the mode continuum.
#tesoloz
